net.wimpi.modbus.net
Interface UDPTerminal

public interface UDPTerminal

Interface defining a UDPTerminal.

Version:
1.1 (08/06/2004)
Author:
Dieter Wimberger

Tests if this UDPTerminal is active.

                      throws java.lang.Exception
